meanings.sent1: She outdances her friends at the dance class.
meanings.sent2: The professional dancer outdances all the other contestants.
meanings.sent3: The cat outdances the dog in a funny dance-off.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful ballet outdances the chaotic tap dance.
meanings.sent5: His elegant waltz outdances all other performances.

meanings.definition: To outperform in a dance competition.
meanings.sent1: He outdances his rival in the final round.
meanings.sent2: The team outdances their opponents to win the trophy.
meanings.sent3: The robot outdances the humans in a quirky dance challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her energy on stage outdances everyone else's enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: Their synchronized routine outdances all other acts.
